attributes.action: Petitions challenging the democratic outcome are immoral  and undemocratic.
attributes.additional_details: There cannot be a system where the majority has come to a decision that the losing minority can then petition to have a further referendum where there has been no significant change in circumstances.
attributes.background: We the undersigned request that the initial result of any referendum within the UK stands. Our country is a democracy and we must stand by the majority decision in a vote.
